General advice:

  • Empty your browser's cache
  • Refresh the page (CTRL + R or F5 depending on the browser)
  • Delete your old bookmarks
  • Ensure you are using either Firefox 3.x or Internet Explorer 7.x
  • Google Chrome, Safari, Op√©ra, IE 5.x, IE 6.x and all other browsers are not officially supported by Die2Nite
  • Ensure you have an up-to-date version of Adobe Flash Player.
  • You can report this problem on our technical support site : bug reports.
